description: A system designed to streamline and automate the purchase processes for a manufacturing company, ensuring efficient tracking of purchase requests, orders, and supplier interactions.

sheets.name: Suppliers

columns.name: Supplier_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each supplier.

columns.name: Supplier_Name
columns.description: The official name of the supplier company.

columns.name: Contact_Email
columns.description: Email address of the supplier's primary contact.
columns.validation: must be a valid email address

columns.name: Phone_Number
columns.description: Contact phone number for the supplier.
columns.validation: must be a valid phone number

columns.name: Address
columns.description: Supplier's business address.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date supplier was added to the system.

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date of last modification to supplier details.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the supplier, e.g., Active or Inactive.
columns.validation: must be one of Active, Inactive

sheets.description: Lists all approved suppliers for the manufacturing company's procurement activities.

sheets.name: Purchase_Requests

columns.name: Request_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each purchase request.

columns.name: Requested_By
columns.description: Name of the employee who initiated the purchase request.

columns.name: Department
columns.description: Department requesting the purchase.

columns.name: Request_Date
columns.description: The date when the request was submitted.

columns.name: Item_Description
columns.description: Description of the items requested.

columns.name: Quantity
columns.description: Number of units requested.

columns.name: Estimated_Cost
columns.description: Estimated total cost of the request.

columns.name: Approval_Status
columns.description: Current status of the request's approval workflow.
columns.validation: must be one of Pending, Approved, Rejected

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date the request record was created.

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date the request details were last modified.

sheets.description: Captures all purchase requisitions submitted by departments for review and approval.

sheets.name: Purchase_Orders

columns.name: Order_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each purchase order.

columns.name: Supplier_ID
columns.description: Reference ID of the supplier from whom the order is placed.

columns.name: Request_ID
columns.description: Reference ID of the purchase request leading to this order.

columns.name: Order_Date
columns.description: Date when the order was officially placed.

columns.name: Expected_Delivery
columns.description: Expected date for goods to be received.

columns.name: Total_Amount
columns.description: Total cost of the order.

columns.name: Order_Status
columns.description: Current status of the order process.
columns.validation: must be one of Processing, Completed, Cancelled

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date the order record was created.

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date the order details were last modified.

sheets.description: Records details of approved purchases and their conversion into orders sent to suppliers.

sheets.name: Goods_Receipt

columns.name: Receipt_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each goods receipt record.

columns.name: Order_ID
columns.description: Reference ID of the order these goods are associated with.

columns.name: Receipt_Date
columns.description: Date when the goods were received.

columns.name: Received_Quantity
columns.description: Total quantity of goods received.

columns.name: Quality_Check
columns.description: Indicator of whether a quality check was successful.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date the receipt record was created.

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date the receipt details were last modified.

sheets.description: Tracks the receipt of goods against an order, verifying quantities and condition.

sheets.name: Invoices

columns.name: Invoice_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each invoice.

columns.name: Order_ID
columns.description: Reference ID of the order to which this invoice relates.

columns.name: Invoice_Date
columns.description: Date the invoice was issued by the supplier.

columns.name: Total_Amount
columns.description: Total billed amount as per the invoice.

columns.name: Payment_Status
columns.description: Current payment status of the invoice.
columns.validation: must be one of Unpaid, Paid, Overdue

columns.name: Verification_Status
columns.description: Status of the invoice verification process.
columns.validation: must be one of Pending, Verified, Disputed

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date the invoice record was created.

columns.name: modified_date
columns.description: Date the invoice details were last modified.

sheets.description: Consolidates data on supplier invoices for received goods, including verification status.
